description: A severe diarrhoea outbreak has struck Bhagirathpura in Indore, Madhya Pradesh. Contaminated drinking water has caused at least 10 deaths and sickened over 1,400 residents. Officials identified a leakage in the main water pipeline near a police outpost, leading to sewage contamination. Residents are now fearful of the water supply, even from tankers.

title: 'New York vich munda renda’: Babbulicious performs at Mamdani's oath ceremony - Watch
description: New York City's first Muslim Mayor, Zohran Mamdani, made history with a vibrant subway oath ceremony featuring a viral Punjabi music performance.  Mamdani, known for his outreach to the South Asian diaspora, danced with his wife to a popular track, captivating attendees and sparking widespread social media excitement. This event underscores his commitment to celebrating diverse cultural roots.

He emphasized India's strategic autonomy, dismissing external mediation and highlighting that continued hostility undermines goodwill, impacting pacts like the Indus Waters Treaty.

He resigned after the PCB sacked senior assistant Tim Nielsen without consultation, a decision that blindsided him.  Gillespie also revealed feeling marginalized, questioning the board's commitment to his role. A financial dispute over unpaid dues is ongoing.

Bullet train milestone: First mountain tunnel breakthrough achieved in Maharashtra's Palghar
description: India's bullet train project achieved a significant milestone with the breakthrough of a 1.5-km mountain tunnel in Palghar, Maharashtra. This marks the first mountain tunnel completion on the Mumbai-Ahmedabad corridor. With this, the stretch between Thane and Ahmedabad is now clear, leaving only the Mumbai-Thane undersea section as a constraint. The first bullet train is anticipated by August 15, 2027.

title: CBSE's reminder for class 10 and 12 practical exams 2026: Guidelines explained
description: CBSE has issued an important reminder for all schools regarding Class 10 and 12 practical exams for the 2026 board exams. Practical exams, projects, and internal assessments are scheduled from January 1 to February 14, 2026. Schools must upload marks on the same day of the exam. All arrangements for labs and examiners must be in place.

title: 'Border 2': Varun drops new pics with teaser of 'Ghar kab aaoge' song
description: Varun Dhawan shared new pictures from the song 'Ghar Kab Aaoge' for the upcoming war drama 'Border 2'. Composer Anu Malik has clarified that he has received proper credit for the song's recreation. The film, featuring Sunny Deol and Diljit Dosanjh, is slated for a January 23, 2026 release.

title: China to deploy military in Balochistan? Mir Yar Baloch flags ‘serious threat’ to EAM
description: Baloch leader Mir Yar Baloch has warned of potential Chinese military deployment in Pakistan's Balochistan region due to deepening China-Pakistan ties and the CPEC project. He expressed concern over decades of repression in Balochistan and urged India to bolster Baloch resistance forces. Baloch representatives view the escalating strategic alliance as dangerous, potentially threatening both Bharat and Balochistan's futures.

description: Two men were arrested in Raigarh, Chhattisgarh, for allegedly stripping an on-duty woman constable during an anti-mining protest. A viral video showed the constable pleading for mercy as her uniform was torn. The incident, linked to an agitation against a coal block, saw villagers blocking roads and confronting police. Another video reportedly showed a female Town Inspector being kicked.

title: NBEMS leaves NEET PG out of its exam calendar: Why a missing date feels like warning
description: NBEMS has published its tentative exam calendar for 2026, but NEET-PG is not on it  and that blank space has spooked aspirants. On X, candidates are asking why the country’s biggest PG medical exam has no tentative window when smaller NBEMS exams do. With prep timelines, internships and planning already tight, many see the omission as uncertainty, not routine scheduling.

description: The UAE has unified Friday prayer timings to 12:45 PM across all emirates starting January 2, 2026, simplifying schedules for families and workers. This change, part of the 'Year of the Family' initiative, aims to synchronize community events. Expect increased traffic due to school dismissals and concentrated mosque-goers, with public transport frequencies boosted. Weather remains fair with mild temperatures.

A player and tournament organiser have been summoned for questioning as authorities examine the circumstances and intent behind the flag's appearance. The privately organised league is not recognised by the state cricket association.

title: Swiss ski resort tragedy: Video shows moment New Year’s fire broke out - what caused the blaze
description: A devastating fire at a crowded New Year's party in Crans-Montana, Switzerland, claimed at least 40 lives and injured over 100. The blaze, believed to have started in the basement venue with a single staircase exit, caused widespread panic as patrons struggled to escape. Investigations are underway to determine the cause and examine safety compliance.

description: Zohran Mamdani, sworn in as New York’s mayor on Wednesday, marked the moment by thanking his family from “Kampala to Dilli,” reflecting his transnational roots. Born in Uganda to scholar Mahmood Mamdani and filmmaker Mira Nair, he moved to the US as a child and became a citizen in 2018. The first South Asian and Muslim mayor of New York, Mamdani won decisively in November, blending themes of affordability with cultural references that resonated strongly with the diaspora.

description: A shocking incident unfolded in Mumbai after New Year celebrations. A 25-year-old woman allegedly attacked her 42-year-old lover, slashing his private parts with a sharp weapon. The victim, who is married with children, had refused to leave his wife for the accused. The woman is currently on the run. The victim underwent surgery and is recovering.

title: Brittany Mahomes shares New Year glimpse as Patrick Mahomes grinds through rehab
description: Patrick Mahomes is entering 2026 focused entirely on rehab after suffering ACL and LCL tears late in the season. A New Year post from Brittany Mahomes confirmed he is still on crutches, reinforcing the long road ahead. Andy Reid stressed patience, noting Mahomes remains around the team while prioritizing recovery over travel or timelines.

title: NHL trade rumours: Canucks linked to Sherwood, Pettersson; Bruins eye Maccelli
description: NHL trade buzz is intensifying as the Vancouver Canucks reportedly explore deals involving Kiefer Sherwood and Elias Pettersson. Meanwhile, the Boston Bruins are rumored to be eyeing Matias Maccelli to bolster their offense. With the March 6 trade deadline looming, these potential moves are capturing significant league attention, hinting at imminent roster changes for both franchises.

title: Tesla's former AI boss: Google Waymo cannot match Tesla's self-driving tech
description: Former Tesla AI chief Andrej Karpathy believes Google's Waymo couldn't replicate Tesla's recent coast-to-coast autonomous drive. He highlighted Tesla's end-to-end neural network versus Waymo's modular system, which struggled during a San Francisco power outage. Karpathy praised the milestone despite recent criticism from Elon Musk about his "dated" views.

title: Candace Owens sparks buzz with viral video referencing Charlie and Erika Kirk
description: Candace Owens shared a fast paced video filled with pop culture and political memes, featuring references to Stranger Things, Justin Bieber, Sean “Diddy” Combs, and Charlie and Erika Kirk. The montage blended celebrity controversy with internet humor, fueling speculation about her teased 2026 return and reinforcing her strategy of using viral content to drive attention and online debate.

title: Fans hail Ayesha Curry’s 'A+ wife move' as gesture for Stephen Curry goes viral
description: Ayesha Curry recently garnered widespread praise from fans for wearing her husband Stephen Curry's Davidson jersey during a visit to his alma mater. This heartwarming gesture, seen during a tribute to the NBA star, effectively silenced recent marriage rumors. Fans lauded her unwavering support and loyalty, highlighting the couple's strong bond.

title: Caitlin Clark & Connor McCaffery 2025 net worth: Earnings & endorsements
description: Caitlin Clark and Connor McCaffery, a power couple in the sports world, boast a combined net worth of $11.5 million. Clark, a WNBA star, has secured lucrative endorsements alongside her rookie contract. McCaffery, a rising basketball coach, is building his career after playing multiple sports in college. Their individual successes contribute to their impressive financial standing.
